title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite Type Quest Act Act 1 Location Underdark - Myconid Colony Reward Item of Mind-Shielding

Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite

Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite can be acquired during Act 1 as one of the methods to Find a Cure, a Main Quest in BG3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experienc
